# Government Tender Announcement
## Transportation, Installation, Maintenance, and Removal of Digital Signage Towers

### Notice Information

* **Reference Number**: 10231896
* **Title**: Transportation, Installation, Maintenance, and Removal of Digital Signage Towers for Capital Experience events in the National Capital Region.
* **Publication Date**: December 12, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: February 14, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Contracting Entity**: Canadian Heritage
* **Contact**: Marc-André Valin (contrats-contracting@pch.gc.ca)

### Requirement Description

The Canadian Heritage department is seeking a Standing Offer for the provision of Transportation, installation, maintenance, and removal of Digital Signage Towers for Capital Experience events in the National Capital Region on an as-and-when-required basis.

#### Project Duration

* Initial period: March 31, 2027
* Optional period: April 1, 2027, to March 31, 2028

### Evaluation Process and Selection Methodology

The selection of a successful bidder will be based on the following mandatory technical evaluation criteria:

1.  **Transportation and Installation Expertise**: The bidder must provide proof of at least two completed projects within the last five years demonstrating their experience in:
    *   Transportation, maintenance, and installation of outdoor event-related equipment with a sustained power source under all-weather conditions.
2.  **Comprehensive Work Plan**: The bidder must provide a detailed work plan outlining how they will meet all the requirements listed in Section 3 of the Statement of Work.
3.  **Evaluation**: Offers must meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be considered responsive.

### Security Requirements

No security requirements are applicable.

### Attachment

The tender notice and attachments can be downloaded from the [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca) website:

*   Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)
*   Tender document: Revision 1
*   Tender document: Original issue

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
